div.div:
Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other.

Koto revealed her feelings for Aya, but a short while later, Aya disappeared as if she had been spirited away.

Seven years later, Aya reappears to Koto and Erika, just as she was then...

(Source: U-Next, translated)
Sasayaku You ni Koi wo Utau

Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and to Himari's surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what "love" really means... (Source: Kodansha USA) Notes: - Eighteenth place of Tsugimanga 2020 Award in the Manga Category - First place in Yuri Naviâ€™s best Yuri Manga of 2020
